item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump says 'we're going in' to Chicago
item.description: President Trump on Tuesday was asked if he's decided whether he is going to send National Guardsmen to Chicago.

item.title: Israel begins ground operation in Gaza City, IDF says
item.description: Israel has begun its ground operation in Gaza City, Israel Defense Forces Chief of the General Staff Lt. Gen. Eyal Zamir said Tuesday.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: WATCH: Former CDC director talks about criticizing RFK in new op-ed
item.description: "We need to draw attention to this." Dr. Richard Besser explains why he and other former directors publicly denounced RFK's handling of public health.

item.title: WATCH: 'KPop Demon Hunters' cast discuss their favorite songs from the soundtrack
item.description: Arden Cho and May Hong have "Golden" on repeat.
